name: CONSUMER GUIDANCE SOCIETY
briefDescription: CGSI activities include 1) To empower consumer through consumer education vis-a-vis consumer rights and responsibilities 2) Holding talks and exhibitions, screening film on consumer rights awareness among urban poor and rural areas. 3)Legal advice to approach consumer courts 4) Consumer complaints redressal / mediation / holding consumer camps 5) Testing consumer products 6) Publication of ‘KEEMAT” a bi-monthly news magazine 7) CGSI is entrusted with the work of Consumer Helpline project by Dept of Consumer Affairs Govt. Of Maharashtra and Central Govt.CGSI is represented on various statutory bodies like BIS, TRAI, Maharashtra Electricity Regulatory Commission, Maharashta State Consumer Protection Council etc.
